effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 374,141 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 172,404.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 3.4 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Transmogrified to:
Eternal Cloak of the August Acolyte

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 270,224 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,660 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
